body_text:
@mythmon r?
The ODG file included is the LibreOffice Draw file used to generate the sequence diagram in the PNG. I couldn't find a text-based format I liked for sequence diagrams so I just drew it manually. It's kinda simple but I think a visual description is useful. We can update or remove it later depending on how useful it ends up being.

title: Fix bug 1268743: Improve documentation for self-repair.
body:
@mythmon r?

The ODG file included is the LibreOffice Draw file used to generate the sequence diagram in the PNG. I couldn't find a text-based format I liked for sequence diagrams so I just drew it manually. It's kinda simple but I think a visual description is useful. We can update or remove it later depending on how useful it ends up being.
